snippet: The new McLaren Mercedes Formula One car was unveiled on Wednesday, and it looked a lot better than the new Caterham car, causing a collective sigh of relief for fans and drivers.
abstract: The new McLaren Mercedes Formula One car was unveiled on Wednesday, and it looked a lot better than the new Caterham car, causing a collective sigh of relief for fans and drivers.
lead_paragraph: When the newly named Caterham team presented its 2012 car last week, the first of the Formula One teams to do so, there was a sudden intake of breath as fans, drivers and F1 people in general said, "Gosh, that's ugly!"

headline.main: New McLaren: The Importance of Being Beautiful
